hero.summary: A junior full-stack developer who enjoys turning ideas into working web applications and continuously improving through real projects.

about.heading: A little about me
about.body: I'm a junior software developer focused on building full-stack web applications and deploying them. I enjoy turning problems into useful working products and continuously improving my skills through hands-on projects. Currently a final-year student at Kaunas University of Technology.

project1.title: myFi
project1.description: Personal finance management app to help users track expenses, set budgets, and achieve financial goals with ease. Includes OCR receipt scanning, email fetching and NLP-powered insights.

project2.title: Water Quality Measurement System
project2.description: Participated in the development of an IoT-based system designed to monitor and measure various water quality parameters in real-time.

project3.title: Secret Santa Draw
project3.description: A simple PHP web app to draw the names for secret santa or similar random draw cases.

project4.title: Movie Database
project4.description: Wanted to experiment with external APIs, security concepts and more, so I built a movie database that allows to search movie databases, watch trailers, collect favorites and track history/statistics of watched movies.

project5.title: Watermarking tool
project5.description: Another university project that applies watermarks to images. Consisting of JS server and static front-end.

project6.title: Work hours tracking app
project6.description: Created this app for myself while working under freelancing contracts to track worked hours efficiently and see month's statistics.

contact.heading: Let's build something together!
contact.body: I am very open to work or internship opportunities. Feel free to drop me a line.
